Title: Verify that a registered user can add a book to the cart
Steps (Expected): Book is added to cart and visible in cart page
Steps (Steps):
1. Login as registered user
2. Browse books
3. Select a book
4. Click 'Add to Cart' button
Test Data: Book details: Title, Author, Price, ISBN
Preconditions: User is registered and logged in
Description: Test the functionality of adding books to cart for registered users

Title: Verify that guest user can add a book to the cart
Steps (Expected): Book is added to cart and visible in cart page
Steps (Steps):
1. Browse books as guest user
2. Select a book
3. Click 'Add to Cart' button
Test Data: Book details: Title, Author, Price, ISBN
Description: Test the functionality of adding books to cart for guest users

Title: Verify that a success message appears on adding a book
Steps (Expected): Success message appears after adding book
Steps (Steps):
1. Add any book to cart
2. Verify message appears
Test Data: Book details: Title, Author, Price, ISBN
Description: Verify UI feedback when adding items to cart

Title: Verify that cart icon updates after adding a book
Steps (Expected): Cart icon shows updated item count
Steps (Steps):
1. Note initial cart count
2. Add a book
3. Verify cart count increased
Test Data: Book details: Title, Author, Price, ISBN
Description: Test UI update of cart icon after adding items

Title: Verify that duplicate books are grouped in cart
Steps (Expected): Cart shows quantity as 2 instead of separate entries
Steps (Steps):
1. Add same book twice
2. View cart
3. Verify quantity increased
Test Data: Book details: Title, Author, Price, ISBN
Description: Test cart grouping functionality for duplicate items

Title: Verify that user can view cart after adding book
Steps (Expected): Cart page opens showing added book
Steps (Steps):
1. Add a book to cart
2. Click cart icon
3. Verify cart page displays correctly
Test Data: Book details: Title, Author, Price, ISBN
Preconditions: User has added item to cart
Description: Test cart viewing functionality after adding items

Title: Verify that out-of-stock books cannot be added
Steps (Expected): Error message appears and book is not added
Steps (Steps):
1. Find out-of-stock book
2. Attempt to add to cart
3. Verify error message
Test Data: Out-of-stock book details
Description: Test system behavior with out-of-stock items

Title: Verify that discount applies after adding book
Steps (Steps):
1. Add book with discount
2. View cart
3. Verify discount applied
Test Data: Book with discount coupon/promo
Description: Test discount application functionality

Title: Verify that adding book persists after refresh (registered)
Steps (Expected): Book remains in cart after refresh
Steps (Steps):
1. Login as registered user
2. Add book to cart
3. Refresh page
4. Verify book still in cart
Test Data: Book details: Title, Author, Price, ISBN
Preconditions: User is registered and logged in
Description: Test cart persistence for registered users

Title: Verify that cart data is stored in session/local storage (guest)
Steps (Steps):
1. As guest user, add book to cart
2. Check session storage
3. Verify cart data exists
Test Data: Book details: Title, Author, Price, ISBN
Description: Test cart storage mechanism for guest users

Title: Verify that registered user can remove a book
Steps (Steps):
1. Login as registered user
2. Add book to cart
3. Remove book from cart
4. Verify removal
Test Data: Book details: Title, Author, Price, ISBN
Description: Test book removal functionality for registered users

Title: Verify that removing a book updates the cart total
Steps (Steps):
1. Add multiple books to cart
2. Note total amount
3. Remove one book
4. Verify new total
Test Data: Multiple book details
Description: Test cart total calculation after removal

Title: Verify that cart becomes empty after last book is removed
Steps (Steps):
1. Add single book to cart
2. Remove the book
3. Verify empty cart state
Test Data: Book details: Title, Author, Price, ISBN
Description: Test empty cart state functionality

Title: Verify that guest user can remove a book
Steps (Steps):
1. As guest user, add book to cart
2. Remove book from cart
3. Verify removal
Test Data: Book details: Title, Author, Price, ISBN
Preconditions: Guest user has items in cart
Description: Test book removal functionality for guest users

Title: Verify that success message appears after removal
Steps (Steps):
1. Remove book from cart
2. Verify success message appears
Test Data: Book details: Title, Author, Price, ISBN
Description: Test UI feedback for removal action

Title: Verify that remove button is functional for all books
Steps (Steps):
1. Add multiple books to cart
2. Verify remove button works for each
Test Data: Multiple book details
Description: Test remove button functionality for all items

Title: Verify that a user can increase book quantity
Steps (Steps):
1. Add book to cart
2. Increase quantity
3. Verify new quantity and price
Test Data: Book details: Title, Author, Price, ISBN
Description: Test quantity increase functionality

Title: Verify that a user can decrease book quantity
Steps (Steps):
1. Add book with quantity >1 to cart
2. Decrease quantity
3. Verify new quantity and price
Test Data: Book details: Title, Author, Price, ISBN
Description: Test quantity decrease functionality

Title: Verify that quantity cannot go below 1
Steps (Steps):
1. Attempt to decrease quantity to 0
2. Verify quantity stays at 1
Test Data: Book details: Title, Author, Price, ISBN
Description: Test minimum quantity validation

Title: Verify that total price updates with quantity change
Steps (Steps):
1. Change book quantity
2. Verify total price calculation
Test Data: Book details: Title, Author, Price, ISBN
Description: Test price calculation with quantity changes

Title: Verify guest user can change book quantity
Steps (Steps):
1. As guest user, add book to cart
2. Change quantity
3. Verify update
Test Data: Book details: Title, Author, Price, ISBN
Preconditions: Guest user has items in cart
Description: Test quantity change for guest users

Title: Verify update quantity doesn't exceed stock
Steps (Steps):
1. Attempt to set quantity above stock level
2. Verify error message
Test Data: Book with limited stock
Description: Test stock quantity validation

Title: Verify that quantity field accepts only numbers
Steps (Steps):
1. Attempt to enter non-numeric characters
2. Verify input is rejected
Test Data: Invalid characters: letters, symbols
Description: Test quantity field input validation

Title: Verify error message appears for invalid quantity
Steps (Steps):
1. Enter invalid quantity (0, negative, non-numeric)
2. Verify error message
Test Data: Invalid quantity values
Description: Test error handling for invalid quantities

Title: Verify that total price is correctly calculated
Steps (Expected): Total matches sum of item prices
Steps (Steps):
1. Add multiple books to cart
2. Verify total calculation
Test Data: Multiple book details
Description: Test cart total calculation accuracy

Title: Verify discount is applied properly
Steps (Steps):
1. Apply discount code/promo
2. Verify discount calculation
Test Data: Valid discount code/promo
Description: Test discount application in cart summary

Title: Verify estimated delivery is shown
Steps (Steps):
1. View cart summary
2. Verify delivery estimate exists
Test Data: User location data
Description: Test delivery estimate display

Title: Verify summary updates on removal
Steps (Steps):
1. Remove item from cart
2. Verify summary updates
Test Data: Book details: Title, Author, Price, ISBN
Description: Test summary update after removal

Title: Verify summary persists on page refresh
Steps (Steps):
1. View cart summary
2. Refresh page
3. Verify summary persists
Test Data: Book details: Title, Author, Price, ISBN
Description: Test summary persistence

Title: Verify no summary shown for empty cart
Steps (Steps):
1. Ensure cart is empty
2. Verify no summary shown
Description: Test empty cart summary behavior
